item.title: Getting ready to write a Blog
item.description: I have never been too interested in sharing my thoughts online. Even so, lately, I can’t help but wonder about the knowledge I cannot recall anymore or whatever I may forget in the future. For that reason, I will start taking notes on the different things I spend some time on. Said that, let the posts begin.
